r.s: Create and Use PHP Archive files
r.d: PHP_Archive allows you to create a single .phar file containing an entire application.
r.n: Bugfix release * change error_reporting to E_ALL. Was stupidly using E_ERROR | E_WARNING | E_PARSE | E_NOTICE * change __HALT_PHP_PARSER__ to __HALT_COMPILER() * rework fread() usage to avoid all potential bugs with chunks larger than 8192 * drop support for PHP 4.3.x and 5.0.x. Streams are impossible to fully support due to bugs in all PHP versions < 5.1.0.
